thread.section_title: GoDISH Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GoDISH | godish.com | 3 of 226
thread.title: Harry Paterson

author: Harry Paterson
title: Harry Paterson
text: Johnathan was just great he came and kept me up to date when he would b e here. But the full month's bill and my add one came on one bill for just two weeks later. told I would be charged for 2 weeks + the add-ons. but instead I got a bill over 100.00. I called and was promised that I would hear back about my concern. NO RETURN CALL. But I am enjoying the picture and sound. So far no signal problems.
